short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small utility extension used to load and sort all C1 offers by mileage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that enhances the Capital One rewards offers page by adding mileage-based sorting functionality. Easily find the best mileage deals by sorting offers in ascending or descending order.
